tool_description: Mboum - Stock Screener and APIs for realtime stock, options ...
title: mboum

api_list.name: News
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mboum.p.rapidapi.com/qu/quote/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mboum.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
